site_name: Two Sites: SITE 1 Land At 3 Millharbour And SITE 2 Land At 6, 7 And 8 South Quay Square, South Quay
description: Request for observations from London Borough of Tower Hamlets for:  Request for an Environmental Impact Assessment Scoping Opinion under Regulation 15 of the Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) Regulations 2017 (as amended) in respect of a second Section 73 (minor material amendment)  application which comprises:Demolition of existing on-site buildings; four buildings ranging in height, up to 44 storeys (143.120m AOD height); Up to 1,619 residential units of mixed tenure; Up to 8,410 m2 GEA of school and education floorspace (use class D)
